value: The expanse of human knowledge is vast, and when bringing it into the classroom, it's necessary to curate specific elements that offer students a comprehensive understanding. Nevertheless, this doesn't discourage students from delving deeper and broadening their perspectives. To assist individuals on this journey, this segment of History Tracers presents insights into diverse cultures throughout history, organized within common historical epochs. Our aim is to showcase the evolution of humanity across different continents and epochs.

This section of History Tracers draws inspiration from the works of Roberto Moras (Moras, Roberto, Legado Ancestral), Cy (Cy, History with Cy) and Yuval Noah Harari (Harari, Yuval Noah, Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind).
